member.name: T:Delay.DeferredLoadListBox
member.summary: Implements a subclass of ListBox based on a StackPanel that defers the loading of off-screen items until necessary in order to minimize impact to the UI thread.

member.name: M:Delay.DeferredLoadListBox.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: Handles the application of the Control's Template.

member.name: M:Delay.DeferredLoadListBox.IsItemItsOwnContainerOverride(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own item container.
member.returns: true if the item is its own item container; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Delay.DeferredLoadListBox.GetContainerForItemOverride
member.summary: Creates or identifies the element used to display a specified item.
member.returns: A DeferredLoadListBoxItem corresponding to a specified item.

member.name: M:Delay.DeferredLoadListBox.PrepareContainerForItemOverride(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Object)
member.summary: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
member.param: The element used to display the specified item.

member.name: T:Delay.DeferredLoadListBoxItem
member.summary: Implements a subclass of ListBoxItem that is used in conjunction with the DeferredLoadListBox to defer the loading of off-screen items.

member.name: T:Delay.LowProfileImageLoader
member.summary: Provides access to the Image.UriSource attached property which allows Images to be loaded by Windows Phone with less impact to the UI thread.

member.name: M:Delay.LowProfileImageLoader.GetUriSource(System.Windows.Controls.Image)
member.summary: Gets the value of the Uri to use for providing the contents of the Image's Source property.
member.param: Image needing its Source property set.
member.returns: Uri to use for providing the contents of the Source property.

member.name: M:Delay.LowProfileImageLoader.SetUriSource(System.Windows.Controls.Image,System.Uri)
member.summary: Sets the value of the Uri to use for providing the contents of the Image's Source property.
member.param: Image needing its Source property set.
Uri to use for providing the contents of the Source property.

member.name: P:Delay.LowProfileImageLoader.IsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether low-profile image loading is enabled.
